.. code-block:: python3


    import numpy
    from PyOptik import Sellmeier


    material = Sellmeier('BK7')

    RI = material.get_refractive_index(wavelength=[1310e-9, 1550e-9])

    figure = material.plot(
        wavelength_range=numpy.linspace(300e-9, 3500e-9, 300)
    )

    figure.show()
